settings.heading: LUMIRED OFFERS A GENEROUS AND RESOURCEFUL AFFILIATE PROGRAM!
settings.description:
Commissions are paid for each sale referred via your unique tracking link (Minimum of 2 sales to qualify). Commissions are 10% sitewide.

We have a 30 day trial period on most products, so all sales vest for 30 days before being eligible for payment.

When applying, please include specific web urls, social handles etc. After you submit your information, we will review it and if approved, we will send you the personalized link for your customers to click on and purchase from.

settings.custom_html: Affiliate Registeration
